item.title: Podman: the Docker alternative.
item.description: Yes, there's a fully opensourced version of docker and it's called podman. It can be installed in other OS but what I'm showing is in WSL/Ubuntu. 1~$sudo apt install podman It's actually a drop-in replacement for Docker. See details in this article.
